(I won't be posting Saturday. I'll be going to an anime convention 
all day. Like your going me miss me anyhow. :P)




Quickstrike:




Quickstrike entered the CR room, where he saw Rattrap, as he 
suspected. He jolted, glaring at him with huge optics. Quickstrike's 
face forced a grin on his mouth plate. He stepped forward, until he  
backed him up. 

"Ah owe ya this," Quickstrike said. 

He backed up close to the CR chamber. While the rat reached for his 
gun, he decked him across the head. Rattrap hit the floor with a 
clang. Quickstrike stepped up closer, then hold his foot on his body. 

"Ah'm gonna have fun goin' this."

Rattrap stirred lightly, trying to pick up his head. Quickstrike 
grabbed him and picked him up, lifting him off from the floor. He 
chuckled, then threw him.

"Yer gonna regret livin', vermin." He laughed with the curving strips 
of metal quivering.
